page.title: 03 ANIMALS
page.content: We have found out that{twice}as many people have pets than ones that don't. This is probably because people have a lot of room to put them in as Bitterley has a lot of countryside. {Dogs are most popular.}This is because people like them to guard the house while they are out.Farmers need them to herd sheep.{Cats}are probably the second most popular because they catch vermin. Most people have one pet.This might be because people don't like buying too much food.Most people keep pets inside. However,there are outside animals. 5{people keep fishes.}They can be inside and outside.Altogether in our block there are:{28 dogs,21 {cats,10 birds,6 ponies,1 hamster,3 {rabbits,0 snakes.}The others were 1 goat and a gerbil.
